'''''Amon Hen'' 183''' is the one-hundred-and-eighty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[2003]].

* Cover: ''Glorfindel''
